Package de.lambeck.pned.models.data.validation

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IValidationController
    Interface for validation controllers for IDataModel.
    IValidationMsg
    Interface for messages for IValidationMsgPanel.
    IValidationMsgPanel
    Interface for ValidationMsgPanel.
    IValidator
    Interface for validators for the ValidationController.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractValidator
    Abstract validator for IDataModel to be used in combination with the ValidationController.
    AllNodesOnPathsValidator
    Checks that all nodes are on a path between the start place and the end place.
    EnabledTransitionsValidator
    Checks which transitions are enabled or not and detects unsafe transitions.
    EndPlacesValidator
    Checks the number of end places in a workflow net.
    InitialMarkingValidator
    Sets the initial marking (token on the start place) if the model was modified but leaves an existing initial marking from a PNML file unchanged in case of the first validation of the model.
    StartPlacesValidator
    Checks the number of start places in a workflow net.
    ValidationController
    Implements a Thread which regularly checks the current IDataModel of the IDataModelController with a variable Map of type AbstractValidator.
    ValidationMsg
    The message class for AbstractValidator.
    ValidationMsgPanel
    Implements a text area for validation messages.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    EValidationColor
    Color values for the validation text area
    EValidationResultSeverity
    Enum for the severity (importance) of messages for/problems in a workflow net.
